price: E inspiramo-lhe essa ordem: que esses serão exterminados, até o último deles, logo ao amanhecer.
arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilayhi dhālika al-amra anna dābira hāulāi maqṭūʿun muṣ'biḥīna
